title: What font is the SKY Brasil font? Or similar?
author: Outrak

comments.content: /S reminds me of [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20130706221506/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100008) and [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20130706221506/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova) but for both, /K is off (customized?).

Thanks Ryuk.

It may be a font designed specifically for the company. I like it much better than those used in Italy, UK and Germany.
